name: A Future for Everyone
description:
In this game, you play as a seer, which can't see the future !

In order to give the future they want to your clients, you wil have to ask them questions about their hobbies, their motto in life, and their role model.

The quicker you are, and the less questions you ask, the more money you'll get at the end of the day.

There is a total of twelves clients, each with a unique dream.

This game was made for Mini Jam 63: Future.
